title: Shop not working / blank
body:
I loaded up league after a while and decided to play and get IP for a new character i got 450+ and went to buy a character but the store was blank , i restarted the client and it was still blank and then i restarted my PC and loaded league it still didnt work. After I asked my friend about it he said his store didnt work too, are they down or is their a problem with my PC / Game.

Edit: after I left it for a while it said there was a problem with your store press the button again but when I pressed it, it had the same problem

replies.body: It looks like we were having a few NA store issues earlier today which might have bled over into the EUW region as well. It looks like everything should be running normally again, but definitely hit me back up if it's still not working!
